thread.title: Koffee With Karan: Kangana Ranaut Is Absolutely Ruthless In This First Promo!
thread.title_full: Koffee With Karan: Kangana Ranaut Is Absolutely Ruthless In This First Promo!

author: Divya Rao
title: Koffee With Karan: Kangana Ranaut Is Absolutely Ruthless In This First Promo!
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 13 . 2017 Kangana Ranaut, Saif Ali Khan 
This week on Koffee With Karan will be two people I’ve always wanted to see on the couch together – Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan ! While Saif has got a dangerously good sense of humour, Kangana is known to be brutally honest… and can you imagine what happens when these two amalgamate? Yup, fireworks! Kangana is ruthless as she tells KJo if there ever was a biopic made on her life, Karan would play the snooty insider who is relentlessly unwelcoming to the outsider. Ouch! Watch the promo here: Up next, the Nawab & the Queen are coming to rule on the Koffee couch like never before! #KoffeeWithKaran pic.twitter.com/eB43uXLz4w 
— Star World (@StarWorldIndia) February 12, 2017 
Can’t wait for Sunday! 71
